    • Wall

      public Wall​(Rectangle drawArea, int brickCount, int lineCount, double brickDimensionRatio, Point ballPos)
      Initializing level, seed, bricks, player and ball
      Parameters:
      drawArea - Dimension/Area size of bricks
      brickCount - Total brick count
      lineCount - Brick wall row count
      brickDimensionRatio - Bricks' dimension/size/width-height ratio
      ballPos - Initial ball position
